ModMetaData.name: ThickWalls
ModMetaData.author: AliceTries
ModMetaData.description: Walls have more HP Walls have more HP Set the Base Max from 350 for steel to 8000 and turned off flammibility. Just a QOL fix for me and maybe you.ts made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
